findings.description: The sweepToken function allows anyone to transfer out any token held by the contract except the underlying token.
findings.reasoning: The function is intentionally designed to allow anyone to sweep tokens, but the vulnerability is in the lack of check against the new TUSD address.

findings.description: The contract uses IERC20(NEW_TUSD).transfer(address(this), amount); in the mint function and IERC20(NEW_TUSD).transfer(msg.sender, amount); in the redeem function.
findings.reasoning: The finding is related to the target but incomplete as it does not correctly identify the vulnerability in the sweepToken function.

target_assessment.type_match_reasoning: The target vulnerability was not mentioned in the findings.

notes: The target vulnerability was not identified in the findings. The findings related to the target were incomplete and classified as PARTIAL_MATCH.
